questions.question: A machine learning engineer is reviewing the code to create a custom inference container image. Which of these does not meet the requirements for inference containers on SageMaker?
options: The container includes the path: opt/ml/model.
The Dockerfile contains an ENTRYPOINT instruction: ENTRYPOINT ["python", "serve.py"]
The container includes a web server configured to listen on port 8000.
The container can accept POST requests to /ping and /invocations endpoints.
correct_answers: The container includes a web server configured to listen on port 8000.
